description: Difference between numerator and denominator of lowest terms fraction from division of a highly composite number (1) by its predecessor.
comments: Successive fractions are 2/1, 2/1, 3/2, 2/1, 2/1, 3/2, 4/3, 5/4, 2/1, 3/2, 4/3, 3/2, 2/1.This sequence is not multiplicative.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 31 2000
